> <OLD>
>
> Nightshift gasps and out of reflex, he springs into the air toward the queen
> in an attempt to distract her.
>
> " Don't even go there, ya ugly bug!  Batscout, move it!  Get outa here!"

<NEW>

The QUEEN continued to cackle, her four bladed arms held out in the
air like some sort of misshapen Preying Mantis her wings flaring out
behind her as the wind continued to pick up.

She looked down to see her two drones, the same ones that had led
BATSCOUT and NIGHTSHIFT to this very room leap to intercept NIGHTSHIFT
as he leaped, their bodies colliding with his!

"You are a brave species!' The QUEEN said, her insectiod features
managing to curve into something akin to a smile. "Foolish, but brave
none the less."

Then lightning struck! Once, and then again! and the energy was
siphoned into the growing energy that was building in the hive-like
structure in the center of the room. Even the QUEEN was beginning to
glow!

POLAR CLAW, followed by WOLFGANG and RAMULUS stepped around the corner
to face the QUEEN. At the same time BATSCOUT flew at POLAR CLAW
transforming into one of his shoulder mounted cannons!

"Shut this . . . what ever it is off!" POLAR CLAW said, his powerful
voice rising above the sound of the wind and storm that was filling
the room. He pointed his weapons at the QUEEN as did the others with
him.

The QUEEN just cackled madly as the lightning struck again, the stream
of energy hitting the Hive, causing it and the queen to glow brighter.

(TAG)

- Preston
